reviewText:
One Way Flight is a very simple/basic collect/hidden object/puzzle game.

I completed the game in about two hours.

It looks good but is very simplistic overall and barely worth the $5 it cost me on it on sale.

Possibly a decent game for a younger player.
voteText: 14 of 16 people (88%) found this review helpful

reviewText:
Though I recommend this game, it's more a game for kids.
Really simplistic and quite short. I've bought this for 4 Euro's and in my opinion it's too expensive because I bought once a five in one bundel for 5 Euro's with 5 much better HOG's than this one.

I repeat: buy this one for your kid or little nephew....
voteText: 1 person found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText:
Normally I love games like these, but this particular one is just....no.

Bland, slow, items are difficult to spot.  I find myself randomly clicking instead of actually searching.

A shame because the concept itself is very interesting.
